Error.Message: SQLSTATE[42S22]: Column not found: 1054 Unknown column 'UserSingInName' in 'field list'

Argument.SQL:
SELECT			D.*, 
				CONCAT(D.DoctorID, '') AS DoctorLookupCaption,DepartmentName,GenderName,UserSingInName, 
				'' AS _Other

FROM			hms_doctor AS D
	/*LEFT JOIN		X AS Y ON Y.YID = D.YID*/
	LEFT JOIN hms_department AS DP ON DP.DepartmentID=D.DepartmentID
	LEFT JOIN sphp_gender AS GD ON GD.GenderID=D.GenderID
	LEFT JOIN sphp_user AS U ON U.UserID=D.UserID
		

WHERE D.UserID=992 
ORDER BY DoctorID ASC 
LIMIT 0, 200
